name: Lift Simulator 2016
description:
Lift Simulator 2016

Congratulations! You are now a lift.

Your job is to ferry the infinite hoards of workers to their desired floors, as indicated by the numbers above their heads.

Make sure you don't let the queues get too big -- if a queue becomes 5 people long, you (arbitrarily) lose!

If you manage to get three people to their destination at once, you'll get a bonus 10 points.

Controls

Up -- Up

Down -- Down

If you hold the up/down key down, you can skip levels without stopping.

Made in a very busy weekend. I'm sorry for the MSPaint-age. So sorry.
